mapper.select: SELECT *, t2.dept_nm, t3.rank_nm FROM semp t1 LEFT JOIN sdept t2 ON t1.dept_cd = t2.dept_cd LEFT JOIN srank t3 ON t1.rank_cd = t3.rank_cd WHERE emp_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO semp(emp_id, emp_pw, emp_nm, emp_role, dept_cd, rank_cd) VALUES (#{empId}, #{empPw}, #{empNm}, #{empRole}, #{deptCd}, #{rankCd})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM semp WHERE emp_id=#{empId}) AS flag
